testcase.name: verifyPopupSectionHasCorrectFunctionality

failure.message: The following asserts failed: The string is incorrect, expected [No thanks, I don't like discounts] but found [No thnx, I don't like discounts], Click on 'Send me a coupon' button not redirected to correct page expected [true] but found [false]
